messages.body: $TSLA a message to shareholders.. https://techcrunch-com.cdn.ampproject.org/c/s/techcrunch.com/2017/11/26/in-praise-of-teslas-bankruptcy/amp/

links.title: In praise of Tesla's bankruptcy
links.description: You know everybody loves Tesla-the-company. But did you know that a whole lot of smart people hate Tesla-the-business? " From a return-on-investment-capital standpoint, Tesla is a catastrophe." " The electric-car maker has been burning money at a clip of about $8,000 a minute (or $480,000 an hour.)" " Tesla is losing a massive amount of money with no competition, and yet massive competition is coming."

messages.body: $TSLA Debt market tightening on Tessie and other high risk bonds. https://seekingalpha.com/article/4127688-debt-market-tightening-tesla

links.title: Is The Debt Market Tightening Up On Tesla?
links.description: Outflows from the high-yield bond market space should have Tesla ( TSLA) investors thinking twice about how their company is going to continue to capitalize itself and fund its operations going forward. Reports have come through over the last couple of weeks that outflows from high-yield bonds are picking up and moving towards record pace.
